entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
